name: easyloggingpp
description: Easylogging++ is a single header efficient logging library for C++ applications.

no-defaultfile.description: Do not write to default log file "myeasylog.log" (compile with ELPP_NO_DEFAULT_LOG_FILE)

std-locking.description: Use std::mutex for thread synchronization (compile with ELPP_FORCE_USE_STD_THREAD)

thread-safe.description: Make easyloggingpp thread safe (compile with ELPP_THREAD_SAFE)
